summary: In this Mod Lucien is no longer a ghost and uses Astrid's Blade of Woe and the Shout "Marked for Death" in combat, making him more powerful but not so much to the point of turning him into a Daedric God.
descriptionHtml:
In this Mod Lucien is no longer a ghost and uses Astrid's Blade of Woe and the Shout "Marked for Death" in combat, making him more powerful but not so much to the point of turning him into a Daedric God.

Making Lucien Lachance cooler and powerful for your game become more enjoyable, Dark Brotherhood lover.




For installing the mod you just have to move the files to the folder "Data" in your Skyrim game folder.



(Please, upload some images from this mod in your game if you can, because I can't open my Skyrim in the moment, thanks)


I hope you enjoy this Mod as much as I did :)

- WalkerPr0 BR
author: WalkerPr0
